5#ifndef V8_HEAP_MARKING_BARRIER_H_
6#define V8_HEAP_MARKING_BARRIER_H_
7
8#include "include/v8-internal.h"
9#include "src/base/functional.h"
10#include "src/common/globals.h"
11#include "src/heap/mark-compact.h"
12#include "src/heap/marking-worklist.h"
13#include "src/heap/mutable-page.h"
14
15namespace v8 {
16namespace internal {
17
18class Heap;
19class IncrementalMarking;
20class LocalHeap;
21class PagedSpace;
22class NewSpace;
23
24class MarkingBarrier {
25 public:
26 explicit MarkingBarrier(LocalHeap*);
27 ~MarkingBarrier();
28
29 void Activate(bool is_compacting, MarkingMode marking_mode);
30 void Deactivate();
31 void PublishIfNeeded();
32
33 void ActivateShared();
34 void DeactivateShared();
35 void PublishSharedIfNeeded();
36
37 static void ActivateAll(Heap* heap, bool is_compacting);
38 static void DeactivateAll(Heap* heap);
39 V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE static void PublishAll(Heap* heap);
40
41 static void ActivateYoung(Heap* heap);
42 static void DeactivateYoung(Heap* heap);
43 V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE static void PublishYoung(Heap* heap);
44
45 template <typename TSlot>
46 void Write(Tagged<HeapObject> host, TSlot slot, Tagged<HeapObject> value);
47 void Write(Tagged<HeapObject> host, IndirectPointerSlot slot);
48 void Write(Tagged<InstructionStream> host, RelocInfo*,
49 Tagged<HeapObject> value);
50 void Write(Tagged<JSArrayBuffer> host, ArrayBufferExtension*);
51 void Write(Tagged<DescriptorArray>, int number_of_own_descriptors);
52 // Only usable when there's no valid JS host object for this write, e.g., when
53 // value is held alive from a global handle.
54 void WriteWithoutHost(Tagged<HeapObject> value);
55
56 inline void MarkValue(Tagged<HeapObject> host, Tagged<HeapObject> value);
57
58 bool is_minor() const { return marking_mode_ == MarkingMode::kMinorMarking; }
59
60 Heap* heap() const { return heap_; }
61
62#if DEBUG
63 void AssertMarkingIsActivated() const;
64 void AssertSharedMarkingIsActivated() const;
65#endif // DEBUG
66
67 private:
68 inline void MarkValueShared(Tagged<HeapObject> value);
69 inline void MarkValueLocal(Tagged<HeapObject> value);
70
71 inline bool WhiteToGreyAndPush(Tagged<HeapObject> value);
72
73 void RecordRelocSlot(Tagged<InstructionStream> host, RelocInfo* rinfo,
74 Tagged<HeapObject> target);
75
76 bool IsCurrentMarkingBarrier(Tagged<HeapObject> verification_candidate);
77
78 template <typename TSlot>
79 inline void MarkRange(Tagged<HeapObject> value, TSlot start, TSlot end);
80
81 inline bool IsCompacting(Tagged<HeapObject> object) const;
82
83 bool is_major() const { return marking_mode_ == MarkingMode::kMajorMarking; }
84
85 Isolate* isolate() const;
86
87 Heap* heap_;
88 MarkCompactCollector* major_collector_;
89 MinorMarkSweepCollector* minor_collector_;
90 IncrementalMarking* incremental_marking_;
91 std::unique_ptr<MarkingWorklist::Local> current_worklist_;
92 base::Optional<MarkingWorklist::Local> shared_heap_worklist_;
93 MarkingState marking_state_;
94 std::unordered_map<MutablePageMetadata*, std::unique_ptr<TypedSlots>,
95 base::hash<MutablePageMetadata*>>
96 typed_slots_map_;
97 bool is_compacting_ = false;
98 bool is_activated_ = false;
99 const bool is_main_thread_barrier_;
100 const bool uses_shared_heap_;
101 const bool is_shared_space_isolate_;
102 MarkingMode marking_mode_ = MarkingMode::kNoMarking;
103};
104
105} // namespace internal
106} // namespace v8
107
108#endif // V8_HEAP_MARKING_BARRIER_H_
